body: Playing on The Village on Walls I was able to make a tnt cluster bomb, now it went for a short time since I used only the tnt in my quad but it was able to shoot all the way across the other quad!!  Now I like to think of that one as my practice test because I could make this even better with the help of you, the Avicus community!  Maybe I could do this in a map event so I can do this without interrupting the game its really cool and lots of fun to watch to help join me!

title: TNT Cluster Bomb on Walls
